title: Operando Self-Compliance Document Schema
description: To describe and validate Operando certified applications self-compliance documents

bundleId.description: A string which uniquely identifies the app

title.description: The title of the app, as it will be displayed in Operando

accessedLinks.description: The list of URLS that the app will access

accessedSensors.description: The list of items describing the accessed sensors and their security level

items.description: An object describing a sensor used by the application and it's security level

sensorType.description: A string describing the sensor type.

privacyLevel.description: An integer describing the privacy level (which indicates how the data collected from this senser is being used. Corresponding to PL{i}
